title: MPH: Rovanperä might just have enough time to reach F1
summary: Kalle Rovanperä is quitting rallying to move to single-seaters with the aim of reaching Formula 1, andMark Hughesreckons the Finn's goal is within reach

qa_pairs.question: Which motorsport discipline is Kalle Rovanperä transitioning from?
What is Kalle Rovanperä's goal in motorsport?
wrong_options: To win the World Rally Championship
To become a test driver for Ferrari

qa_pairs.question: What type of racing vehicles is Rovanperä moving to?
